explanation: [0-0] A little boy with a shaved head wearing blue pants sits in a black toy car. His right hand rests on some red strawberries in a green basket. The green basket is on a brown table covered with green turf, and the table has the word "蔬美" in yellow font. Behind the boy, a man and a woman in black clothes stand. To the right of the man in black, a man in a gray shirt stands in front of a fruit stall. In the background, there is a shelf with many drinks.

[0-3] The boy takes a red strawberry from the green basket and takes a bite. The words "浅尝一下" (have a taste) appear in yellow font. The man in the gray shirt behind the boy runs towards him with a surprised look on his face, and the words "小祖宗" (Little Ancestor) appear in red and white font above the scene.

[0-3] The boy takes a red strawberry from the green basket and takes a bite. The words "浅尝一下" (have a taste) appear in yellow font. The man in the gray shirt behind the boy runs towards him with a surprised look on his face, and the words "小祖宗" (Little Ancestor) appear in red and white font above the scene.

The man in the gray shirt behind the boy runs towards him with a surprised look on his face, and the words "小祖宗" (Little Ancestor) appear in red and white font above the scene.

[3-9] The man in the gray shirt then puts the green basket of red strawberries into a plastic bag he's holding. He points at the boy's head with his left hand and walks to the left. The boy watches the man, then turns his head while holding a red strawberry to his mouth with his right hand. The words "真好吃" (So delicious) appear in yellow font.
